resources.string: This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.

This app is designed to detect possible lung condition from X-Ray images. A medical professional can use it as a decision support system to help them take better decision faster. This app is trained on hundreds of X-Ray images with Artificial Intelligence. However, accurate prediction is not guaranteed. This app can only act as a Radiologist's guide. This app is not accredited by any Government/Non-Government Health service regulatory body of any country. Provider of this service is not liable to any diagnostic decision taken by the user of this service.

To get a better predication aim your mobile device to a well lit computer monitor screen or light box with X-Ray image on it. Make sure to fill up the mobile screen with X-Ray image. A camera of less than 8MP is not recommended.

 Designed and developed by Softavion Ltd.
